name: Core Software Engineer
description: General software engineering roles: backend/frontend/fullstack/mobile. Focus on coding, problem solving, debugging, and system thinking.
common_failure_modes: ["vague reasoning", "misses edge cases", "incorrect complexity", "cannot explain decisions", "weak debugging approach"]

name: Data Analyst
description: Analytics roles focused on SQL, metrics, dashboards, and insight storytelling.
common_failure_modes: ["unclear metric definitions", "weak SQL joins/window functions", "jumps to conclusions", "no validation/QA", "weak business framing"]

name: Data Engineer
description: Pipelines, ETL/ELT, warehousing, reliability, and performance.
common_failure_modes: ["poor data modeling", "ignores data quality", "weak tradeoffs", "no monitoring/alerting", "unclear ownership"]

name: Data Scientist
description: Experimentation, modeling basics, product analytics, and reasoning.
common_failure_modes: ["confuses causation", "weak experiment design", "math gaps", "overfits explanation", "no tradeoffs/assumptions"]

name: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Applied ML in production: training, serving, evaluation, and MLOps.
common_failure_modes: ["cannot explain evaluation", "weak data leakage awareness", "no monitoring", "hand-wavy features", "poor tradeoffs"]

name: Infrastructure / Platform Engineer
description: DevOps/SRE/platform engineering: reliability, automation, and systems.
common_failure_modes: ["no runbook thinking", "weak root cause", "ignores observability", "poor prioritization", "unsafe changes"]

name: Security Engineer
description: Security engineering across appsec/cloud/security operations depending on role.
common_failure_modes: ["tactical without risk reasoning", "weak threat models", "misses basics", "poor communication", "no triage/prioritization"]

name: QA / Test Engineer
description: Quality engineering: test strategy, automation, and defect triage.
common_failure_modes: ["tests are shallow", "no edge cases", "poor prioritization", "unclear reproduction steps", "weak collaboration signals"]

name: Product Manager
description: Product discovery, prioritization, execution, stakeholder management, and product sense.
common_failure_modes: ["solution jumps", "unclear success metrics", "weak tradeoffs", "poor stakeholder handling", "no customer insight"]

name: Technical Program Manager
description: Cross-functional delivery of complex technical programs with risk and dependency management.
common_failure_modes: ["no critical path", "weak risk plans", "unclear ownership", "poor cross-team alignment", "hand-wavy technicals"]

name: Product Designer
description: End-to-end product design: problem framing, interaction design, UI craft, and collaboration.
common_failure_modes: ["unclear rationale", "design for self not user", "no iteration", "weak tradeoffs", "poor collaboration signals"]

name: Marketing / Growth
description: Marketing and growth: funnel thinking, messaging, experiments, and analytics.
common_failure_modes: ["vanity metrics focus", "weak hypothesis", "no measurement plan", "unclear audience", "poor prioritization"]

name: Sales / Account
description: Sales roles: discovery, objection handling, negotiation, and pipeline discipline.
common_failure_modes: ["talks too much", "no questions", "pushy not consultative", "weak follow-up", "no process discipline"]

name: Customer Success
description: CSM roles: onboarding, adoption, renewals, escalations, and value realization.
common_failure_modes: ["reactive only", "no success plan", "weak escalation handling", "unclear value metrics", "poor stakeholder mapping"]

name: BizOps / Strategy
description: BizOps/strategy: structured problem solving, analysis, and stakeholder alignment.
common_failure_modes: ["unstructured approach", "weak assumptions", "no sensitivity analysis", "unclear recommendation", "poor stakeholder handling"]

name: Operations
description: Operations: process improvement, execution coordination, and KPI ownership.
common_failure_modes: ["no measurable KPIs", "weak root cause", "poor prioritization", "unclear ownership", "reactive"]

name: Finance & Strategy
description: Finance/FP&A/strategy: modeling, business judgment, and narrative.
common_failure_modes: ["math errors", "no assumptions", "weak business linkage", "unclear narrative", "misses risks"]

name: Consulting
description: Management consulting: case interviews, structured problem solving, and synthesis.
